title: zuizui
author: zuizui
created_time: October 13, 2022, 11:32:50 PMLast edit: October 14, 2022, 03:32:42 AM by zuizui
content: For sale！ bitFlyer Edition Satori Coins 4colorsLimited edition of only 150 of each color!・Other Photoshttps://imgur.com/a/RR4Kwoh・Videohttps://youtu.be/o2hcdLsJaMIAll 4 colors, all contain 0.001 BTC. Only the yellow one is degraded but I checked the serial number and it contains 0.001 BTC.Auctions take time, so please contact me with the amount you would like to purchase via PM this time. Shipping and escrow fees are to be paid separately by the buyer (I plan to ship by EMS from Japan)Pink was recently sold for 0.123 BTC.I cannot accept any price negotiation after the sale. Thank you for your cooperation.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Would love to make an offer - but have no idea where to even start - can someone give me a rough ballpark these might be worth so I can make an educated offer?

comments.author: zuizui
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on October 14, 2022, 12:19:40 AMWould love to make an offer - but have no idea where to even start - can someone give me a rough ballpark these might be worth so I can make an educated offer?  Thanks for posting, I've added pics and video. FYI, the pink bitFlyer satori recently sold for 0.123 BTC on bitcointalk auction.

FYI, the pink bitFlyer satori recently sold for 0.123 BTC on bitcointalk auction.Good reference - way out of my range then  glws!

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: the poker chips would also be something great for my collection but the price of the pink chip (sold a few days ago) is/was much too exaggerated high in my opinion

comments.body: Quote from: cygan on October 14, 2022, 10:53:37 AMthe poker chips would also be something great for my collection but the price of the pink chip (sold a few days ago) is/was much too exaggerated high in my opinionPlease offer what you think is a reasonable value for each.Yellow is now sold, thanks for the offer!
